sent.orig: Jason improved this lunch break by having a business lunch with his client.
sent.trans: 贾森利用午饭休息的时间与客户一起吃了饭。

sent.orig: We lunch in the dining hall at half past twelve. I like school lunch!
sent.trans: 十二点半我们在餐厅吃中饭，我喜欢学校的午饭！

sent.orig: Please ask him back for lunch, lunch is ready.
sent.trans: 请叫他回来回来吃午饭，午饭准备好了。

sent.orig: Lunch Time: Hot dog, popcorn hot lunch, pizza and beverages.
sent.trans: 午餐时间热狗，爆米花，披萨，中国菜，西瓜，甜点、饮料。

sent.orig: Where did you have your lunch? I had my lunch in a snack bar nearby.
sent.trans: 你在哪儿吃的午饭？我在附近一家快餐店吃午饭。
